parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned when registration is successful

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: This token ID will access using to specific your permission to the use. Each API can be used and access once a token

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shop's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for this API

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, sign type, timestamp

parameters.name: best_sale_id
parameters.description: If you delete a item, will delete all records of this id

response_fields.name: partner_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: indicate error type if error. Empty if no error

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: indicate error details if is error. Empty if no error
